page.title: 15ST. THOMAS'S GUIDES
page.content: Our guide troop meets every Friday at the chapel at 7.00pm.Our uniform in the winter is trousers,blue shirt,green neckerchief,woggle and hat.In the summer we wear a blue skirt instead of trousers.We have to take our guide books and folders with us and any work we have done during the week.There are 4 patrols called,Robins,Swallows,Blue- tits and Chaffinches and each patrol has it's own leader.We play games such as,Spinning the plate,where everyone sits on a chair in a circle.One person spins a plate on the floor in the centre of the circle,calls someones number out,and that person has to go to the plate to keep it spinning.We also hold jumble sales and go camping at the weekends.On some Fridays we cook.Whilst we are in the guides we work for badges of achievement.I enjoy the Guides.
